hero.title: Education that fits your life.
hero.subtitle: Access world-class video lessons on your schedule, or connect with professional tutors for live one-on-one sessions.

features.videos_text: Master new skills at your own pace with our extensive library of high-quality, expert-led video courses.
features.live_tutoring_text: Get personalized guidance and support with one-on-one sessions from certified tutors, available via video call or in-person.

courses.title: Featured Courses
courses.design_desc: Learn the basics of Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to create logos, posters, and more.
courses.programming_desc: Master the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build your first website.
courses.language_desc: Gain confidence in everyday conversations with practical, interactive lessons.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.step1_desc: Browse our extensive catalog to find the perfect course for your interests and skill level.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Watch video lessons and complete assignments whenever and wherever you want.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Receive a certificate to validate your new skills upon successful course completion.

teachers.title: Meet Our Teachers
teachers.teacher1_bio: John is a passionate web developer with over 10 years of experience in building modern, responsive websites.
teachers.teacher2_bio: Jane is a graphic designer who loves to create beautiful and intuitive user interfaces.
teachers.teacher3_bio: Mike is a language expert who can help you master any language with his innovative teaching methods.

testimonials.title: Trusted by learners across Mongolia
testimonials.student_quote: The interactive lessons and hands-on projects helped me grasp complex concepts much faster. I feel much more confident in my coding skills now.
testimonials.parent_quote: As a parent, I'm thrilled with the quality of education my child is receiving. The instructors are knowledgeable and the platform is easy to use.
testimonials.teacher_quote: Teaching on this platform has been a rewarding experience. I'm able to connect with students from all over the world and share my passion for design.

about.title: Our Mission: Education for All
about.text: We believe that quality education should be accessible, flexible, and tailored to individual needs. EduClass was founded to bridge the gap between traditional learning and the digital age. Our goal is to empower learners with the tools they need to succeed.

why_choose_us.title: Why Choose Us?
why_choose_us.expert_instructors_desc: Learn from industry leaders and certified professionals.
why_choose_us.flexible_learning_desc: Access courses anytime, anywhere, on any device.
why_choose_us.community_support_desc: Join a vibrant community of learners and mentors.

faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.q1: How do I enroll in a course?
faq_section.a1: You can enroll by selecting your desired course on our website, clicking the 'Enroll' button, and completing the online payment. You will then have immediate access to the course materials.
faq_section.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_section.a2: We accept all major domestic and international credit cards. Bank transfers are also available.
faq_section.q3: How long do I have access to a course I purchased?
faq_section.a3: Your purchased courses are stored in your profile forever. You can access them anytime, with no time limits.
faq_section.a4: Yes, upon successful completion of a course, you will be able to download a digital certificate that validates your skills.
